title: Curtin University, WA anyone interested in getting a team together?
body: Hi, Im a Gold 2 support main looking for four other players to create a team and play the oceanic university championship, any Curtin students keen to join me?

replies.body:
Hi there. Plat 3 here from Curtin University. It's good to see you being proactive and attempting to rally the troops, but I think that to be competitive you'd need diamond + players in order to have a shot. I'd be willing to join in if you need numbers, but I really do think there'd be a few diamond/master/challenger players at Curtin who'd be able to do a much better job. 
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Curtin doesn't have a LoL Facebook page that I can see, maybe you'd like to set that up and get input from there?

Yo! Just reinstalled LoL... Gold 5 newb. Played in the acl tourny with a few freinds and got taught a lesson in round 3 but it was fun.
Looking to get more social with LoL and keen to join a team! 
Ign - Want2play

HI! I am a first year starting at Curtin this semester, currently Diamond, feel free to add me ign The Hunt is On. I don't care too much for the whole team thing but I would like to see how many players Curtin has :)

I'd love to be involved in something like this - I've just enrolled! However I'm only Plat and as Jess said above you would probably want higher ranked players. Also I have 120+ ping since moving here. Great to see some initiative from Curtin though - good luck!

Hi, I don't currently attend a university but... i want to join in i main ADC we can try a few games if you want to add IGN is zpredallion have a youtube as well https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFK9WR9nMIzTTSjqsrjJUrA

Hey mate just finishing my enrollment now, I would be keen to join. I am a jungle main Gold 4 and currently coaching  a diamond level 5's team. Would love to get involved in this competition. IGN DovahKen add me.
